attributes.additional_details:
The electorate has been deceived.
The public voted on the issue as they felt at the time and as per the conditions laid out in the phamphlet, paid for by the public purse, delivered and sent to every household. The conservatives, under David Cameron, won an election on this basis. Therefore the current deal proposed doesn't satisfy the outcome of that free and democratic referendum and furthermore makes the outcome of the election the conservatives won at that time a falsehood.
attributes.background: The public has no confidence in the current administration over their handling of the outcome of the referendum to leave the eu and the outcome of a general election won by David Cameron invalid.
